materials.raw_text:
Beryllium Oxide (B6O) - 180 g
Erbium Oxide (Er2O3) - 11 g
Oxygen (O2) - 20 g (from reactive sources)
Scandium Oxide (Sc2O3) - 3 g
Strontium Oxide (SrO) - 150 g

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a precision scale.
2. In a clean, dry glass container, combine Beryllium Oxide, Erbium Oxide, Scandium Oxide, and Strontium Oxide.
3. Slowly introduce oxygen in a controlled environment, ensuring a uniform mixture. Stir thoroughly to ensure homogeneity.
